entry.title: WIND WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then to 70 gusting to 110 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 110 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the evening then west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
